Values.Title: no
Values.Description: Only required items and locations to beat the game will be guaranteed reachable.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Bombchus are properly considered in logic.

Values.Title: medallions
Values.Description: Bridge to Ganon's Castle appears when all 6 medaillons are obtained.

Values.Title: dungeons
Values.Description: Bridge to Ganon's Castle appears when all 6 medaillons and all 3 Spiritual Stones are obtained.

Values.Title: open
Values.Description: Bridge to Ganon's Castle is always there.

Values.Title: stones
Values.Description: Bridge to Ganon's Castle appears when all 3 Spiritual Stones are obtained.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: Bridge to Ganon's Castle appears when Shadow Medaillon, Spirit Medaillon and Light Arrows are obtained.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Chests will be large if they contain a major item and small if they don't.

Values.Title: double
Values.Description: Link takes double the damage.

Values.Title: quadruple
Values.Description: Link takes quadruple the damage.

Values.Title: half
Values.Description: Link takes half the damage.

Values.Title: dungeons
Values.Description: Dungeon entrances are shuffled with each other, including Bottom of the Well, Ice Cavern, and Gerudo Training Grounds.

Values.Title: simple indoors
Values.Description: Shuffle dungeon entrances along with simple Grotto and Interior entrances (i.e. most Houses and Great Fairies).

Values.Title: none
Values.Description: Gossip Stones give no hints.

Values.Title: Stone of Agony
Values.Description: The Stone of Agony is required to read the Gossip Stones hints.

Values.Title: plentiful
Values.Description: Extra major items are added.

Values.Title: scarce
Values.Description: Some excess items are removed, including health upgrades.

Values.Title: minimal
Values.Description: Most excess items are removed.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Dungeons have exactly one major item except Spirit Temple which has TWO items to match vanilla distribution.

Values.Title: no
Values.Description: The Door of Time is closed and will open if you play Song of Time in front of it.

Values.Title: closed deku
Values.Description: Mido blocks the path to the Deku Tree, requiring Kokiri Sword and Deku Shield to access the Deku Tree.

Values.Title: closed
Values.Description: Completing Deku Tree is needed to get out of Kokiri Forest.
Shops have 1 random non-shop item. They will always be on the left side.
Shops have 2 random non-shop items. They will always be on the left side.
Shops have 3 random non-shop items. They will always be on the left side.
Shops have 4 random non-shop items. They will always be on the left side.

Values.Title: random
Values.Description: Each shop will have a random number of non-shop items up to a maximum of 4.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Adds a pack of 10 beans to the item pool, and the Magic Bean Salesman now sells a random item once at the price of 60 Rupees.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: Boss Keys will appear in their vanilla locations.

Values.Title: remove
Values.Description: Boss Keys are removed and all Boss doors are unlocked.

Values.Title: anywhere
Values.Description: Boss Keys can appear anywhere in the world.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Playing Epona's song in front of cows gives an item.

Values.Title: vanilla Light Arrow custcene
Values.Description: Ganon's Castle Boss Key is on the Light Arrow cutscene which unlocks when you get both Shadow and Spirit medallions.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Shuffles the Gerudo Card into the item pool.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Shuffles the Fairy Ocarina and the Ocarina of Time into the item pool.

Values.Title: affordable
Values.Description: All Deku Scrubs sell an item for 10 rupees each.

Values.Title: vanilla
Values.Description: Small Keys will appear in their vanilla locations.

Values.Title: remove
Values.Description: Small Keys are removed and all locked doors in dungeons will be unlocked, except Boss Door.

Values.Title: anywhere
Values.Description: Small Keys can appear anywhere in the world.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Shuffles the songs into the rest of the item pool.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Enabling this shuffles the Weird Egg from Malon into the pool.

Values.Title: adult
Values.Description: Link starts as adult in Temple of Time.

Values.Title: dungeons
Values.Description: Token rewards from Gold Skulltulas within dungeons are shuffled into the pool.

Values.Title: overworld
Values.Description: Token rewards from Gold Skulltulas outside of dungeons are shuffled into the pool.

Values.Title: all tokens
Values.Description: Every Gold Skulltula token is shuffled into the pool.

Values.Title: open for adult
Values.Description: King Zora is always moved in the adult era.

Values.Title: always open
Values.Description: King Zora starts as moved in both the child and adult eras.

Values.Title: open
Values.Description: The bridge in Gerudo Valley is already rebuild.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Pieces of the Triforce have been scattered around the world. Find 20 of them to finish the game !

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Pulling out the Ocarina near a spot at which Pierre can spawn will do so, without needing the song.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Start the game with maxed out Deku Sticks and Deku Nuts.

Values.Title: yes
Values.Description: Anju will give a reward for collecting a random number of Cuccos.

Values.Title: no
Values.Description: The Kokiri Sword is at its vanilla location.
One random trial in Ganon's Castle is active and need to be completed to reach Ganon's Tower.
Two random trials in Ganon's Castle are active and need to be completed to reach Ganon's Tower.
